message: I ended up with a very manual approach using the client in PySimpleSoap and bypassing the WSDL parse as it was taking too long. Would still like to hear the experience of others.

Been working on an a project that requires a WSDL-consuming SOAP client for a few days now and I've come to realize that most of the SOAP clients for Python are no longer being maintained.  Curious if anyone has experience or recommendations?
did you take a look at suds? It's been a while since I've looked at any soap clients, but the last time I looked, it seemed to still be supported
We're using suds here after using SOAPpy for a while. It has its issues, but we've made it work.
